About.title: The Best Implant Orthopedic Distributor Company

profile.label: Our Profile
content: We distribute orthopaedic implants and sports-medicine solutions across Indonesia, supporting surgeons in more than 40 hospitals. All products carry valid AKL registrations and are backed by trained clinical support.

Our compant already have a distribution permit certificate from the authorized agency, so they are legal to distribute. Our sales data has reached above 5000 pcs, which makes our company reliable to complete global demand.
Our orthopaedic portfolio helps surgeons treat trauma and degenerative conditions, supporting faster recovery and improved function.

vision.label: Our Vision
content: To be a leading medical device company that specialized in orthopaedic healthcare, consistently delivering innovative and high-quality solutions to the medical field. We strive to provide exceptional products that meet the highest standards, enabling us to serve both national and international markets with excellence.

history.label: Our History
content: Established in 2016, PT. Biotek Inti Korporindo is a company engaged in Medical Devices. A national-scale company that cooperates with international companies, such as the United Orthopaedic Corporation, Canwell and others . Especially in areas such as orthopaedics, pain management and other medical device products for use in hospitals by doctors, other medical personnel.

Hero.subtitle: Empower your health journey with products designed for well-being and longevity.

Services.description: Delivering high-quality orthopedic implants and medical solutions, designed with innovation and expertise to support faster recovery and long-term performance.

arthroplasty.title: Arthroplasty
arthroplasty.description: Joint replacement systems and instruments for hip and knee.

trauma.title: Trauma
trauma.description: Plates, screws, nails with complete size matrices and instrument sets.

sports-medicine.title: Sports Medicine
sports-medicine.description: Suture anchors, soft-tissue fixation, and arthroscopy accessories.

pain-management.title: Pain Management
pain-management.description: Ambulatory infusion pumps and disposables for postoperative analgesia.

OurWork.subtitle: PT. Biotek Inti Korporindo has more than 5 years of experience providing implant products orthopedics for use by Orthopedic and Traumatology Specialists.

Contact.subtitle: If you are interested in our products and want to know more details, please leave a message here, we will reply you as soon as we can.

TermsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
TermsOfUse.subtitle: The legal terms and conditions governing your use of our website
TermsOfUse.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Biotek Inti Korporindo's Terms of Use. These terms govern your access to and use of our website. By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use and our Privacy Policy.
TermsOfUse.disclaimer: Please read these terms carefully before using our website. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you must not use our website.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using the Biotek Inti Korporindo website, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the Site. We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time.

ipRights.title: Intellectual Property Rights
ipRights.content: Unless otherwise stated, Biotek Inti Korporindo and/or its licensors own all intellectual property rights in the Site and its content. All such rights are reserved. You may view and print pages for personal use only, subject to restrictions set in these terms.

prohibitions.2: Sell, rent, or sub-license material from the Site
prohibitions.3: Reproduce, duplicate, or copy material for commercial purposes
prohibitions.4: Redistribute content from this Site (unless content is specifically made for redistribution)

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.intro: When using our Site, you agree:

list.1: Not to use the Site in any way that causes damage or impairs accessibility
list.2: Not to engage in any data mining, data harvesting, or similar activities
list.3: Not to use the Site for any unlawful purpose or in violation of any laws
list.4: Not to submit false or misleading information through any forms

liability.title: Limitations of Liability
liability.content: Biotek Inti Korporindo will not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or exemplary damages resulting from:

list.1: The use or inability to use the Site
list.2: Unauthorized access to or alteration of your transmissions or data
list.3: Statements or conduct of any third party on the Site
list.4: Any other matter relating to the Site

externalLinks.title: External Links
externalLinks.content: The Site may contain links to third-party websites. These links are provided for your convenience only. Biotek Inti Korporindo has no control over, and assumes no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites.

availability.title: Site Availability
availability.content: We strive to ensure the Site is available 24/7, but we cannot guarantee uninterrupted access. We may suspend, withdraw, or restrict availability for business and operational reasons. We will not be liable if the Site is unavailable at any time.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms of Use shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Indonesia, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.intro: For any questions about these Terms of Use, please contact us:

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.subtitle: Our commitment to protecting your personal information and ensuring your privacy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: At Biotek Inti Korporindo, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled in a safe and responsible manner. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect the information you provide when using our website.
PrivacyPolicy.policyScope: This policy applies to all information collected through our website and any related services, sales, marketing, or events.

informationCollection.title: Information We Collect
informationCollection.intro: We may collect information about you in a variety of ways:

personalData.title: Personal Data
personalData.description: Personally identifiable information such as your name, email address, and phone number that you voluntarily give to us when you contact us through our website.

derivativeData.title: Derivative Data
derivativeData.description: Information our servers automatically collect when you access the site, such as your IP address, browser type, operating system, access times, and pages viewed.

informationUse.title: How We Use Your Information
informationUse.intro: We may use the information we collect about you for various purposes, including to:

purposes.1: Provide, operate, and maintain our website
purposes.2: Improve, personalize, and expand our website
purposes.3: Understand and analyze how you use our website
purposes.4: Respond to your inquiries and provide customer service
purposes.5: Send you marketing and promotional communications (if you've opted in)

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
informationSharing.intro: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information in the following situations:

1.title: Service Providers
1.description: We may share information with third-party vendors who perform services on our behalf.

2.title: Business Transfers
2.description: In connection with any merger, sale of company assets, or acquisition.

3.title: Legal Requirements
3.description: When required by law or to respond to legal process.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to protect your personal information. However, no internet transmission or electronic storage is 100% secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security.

thirdPartyWebsites.title: Third-Party Websites
thirdPartyWebsites.content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.

policyChanges.title: Changes to This Policy
policyChanges.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date at the top of this policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
